name: Unofficial Space Jam Jam Game
description:
There can only be one who will Slam and Jam, will it be you?

Controls:

Use Arrows  to move

esc- to pull up pause menu

use mouse to pick up the ball , throw it and move the camera

Throw the ball at enemies to win.

When you reload the scene the player may not be able to move, just pull up the pause menu and press resume.

Programming BY: Jess and Isa

3D Model by  Jess

Music: 

- Well be Right Back

-  One Winged Baller by pitlight
